alert.note: Alert for Marshall; McLean; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:46AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marshall, eastern Woodford, southeastern Tazewell and western McLean Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 643 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Toluca to Armington. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Minonk, Toluca and Wenona around 650 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bloomington. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39 between mile markers 0 and 39. Interstate 55 between mile markers 148 and 166. Interstate 74 between mile markers 112 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central Illinois.
